basic.description:
A foundation course in drawing and sculpture aimed at examining the visual, tactile and structural characteristics of various materials in relation to 3 dimensional space. 
NOTE    Materials: estimated cost: $250.
LEARNING HOURS    (144 (72Lb;72P)
basic.subject: ARTF
basic.title: Fundamentals of Drawing and Sculpture

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Pre ARTF101 or permission of the instructor.
Recommendation    ARTH120.
Exclusion    No more than 6.0 units from ARTF102; ARTF110; ARTF127.
